person.persName: Obadiah Sizemore (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and blacksmith)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and blacksmith. Virginia native. Married to Rebecca Kennedy Sizemore in Trigg County, Kentucky, on March 1, 1831. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Blacksmith in Caldwell County in 1860.
